overview: Eloísa es una mujer mayor y viuda que mantiene un comedor infantil con su amiga. Juan, su nieto, carece de la presencia de sus padres, consume cocaína, roba dinero a su familia, su hermana padece trastornos alimenticios y se obsesionó con su vecina de enfrente, Inés, a quien acosa telefónicamente. Eloísa is an elderly woman and a widow who runs a children's soup kitchen with her friend. Juan, his grandson, lacks the presence of his parents, uses cocaine, steals money from his family, his sister suffers from eating disorders and became obsessed with his neighbor across the street, Inés, whom he harasses on the phone.
title: Silencios
